name: ACCUM_GRP_SVC_DATE
description: This table stores the accumulated service dates for an accumulation group.

columns.name: ACCUM_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the accumulation group record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACCUMULATED_SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The list of service dates which have been accumulated to this ACG.
